meanings.sent1: The precopulatory behavior of birds includes elaborate courtship displays.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the precopulatory rituals of animals to understand mating patterns.
meanings.sent3: The precopulatory dance of the peacock made all the other birds jealous.
meanings.sent4: His precopulatory actions were like a carefully choreographed ballet, leading up to the main event.
meanings.sent5: The precopulatory phase is crucial for species survival, ensuring successful reproduction.

meanings.definition: Relating to actions or behaviors before mating.
meanings.sent1: The precopulatory signals of insects can be fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: Animals exhibit various precopulatory behaviors to attract mates.
meanings.sent3: The precopulatory antics of the squirrel entertained the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: In the world of insects, precopulatory rituals are like a delicate dance of nature.
meanings.sent5: Understanding precopulatory cues is essential for successful reproduction in many species.

meanings.sent1: The precopulatory phase is crucial for successful mating in many species.
meanings.sent2: Birds engage in precopulatory activities to establish compatibility.
meanings.sent3: The precopulatory preparations of the male fish were meticulous and impressive.
meanings.sent4: The precopulatory rituals of the wolves were a sight to behold under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: Precopulatory behaviors play a significant role in the reproductive success of many animals.
